description: Type of media item. Whether it a feature or an episode of series etc
Asset id assigned in the publisher's CMS
Identifies the cue point in seconds offset. Cue points are places in time where an ad can be inserted in the video
Highly relevant keywords describing the media object. Max 10 elements. amg:keyword is unlooped representation of media:keywords. Ref: https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-keywords

exampleValues: "movie on stock. Set in time persion 1929-1935"
